example.name: full_task_planning_workflow
example.description: This example demonstrates the complete workflow for the Agile Planner mode, from reading the initial design document to generating a final, user-approved implementation plan and handing off to the Agile Dev.
example.context: The user has just completed the design for a new "User Login" feature and now wants to create an implementation plan. The `design.md` and `requirements.md` files already exist.

step.title: Initial Request
step.user_request: Create an implementation plan for the User Login feature.

step.title: Read Input Files
step.action: The mode reads the design and requirements documents.

step.title: Generate Initial Task List
step.action: The mode creates the first version of `tasks.md` based on the design.

write_to_file.content:
# Implementation Plan: User Login
- [ ] 1. **Create Login Form Component** - Create a new file at `src/components/LoginForm.jsx`. - It should include email and password input fields and a submit button. - Ref: Requirement 1.1 - [ ] 2. **Implement API Endpoint for Login** - Add a `POST /api/auth/login` endpoint in `server/routes/auth.js`. - It should validate user credentials against the database. - Ref: Requirement 1.2 - [ ] 3. **Add Unit Tests for Login Endpoint** - Create `tests/api/auth.test.js` to test the login endpoint. - Include tests for valid and invalid credentials. - Ref: Requirement 3.1
